scripts.install-node: npx rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node npm run install
scripts.install-electron: npx rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=electron npm run install
scripts.install-web: npx rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=web npm run install
scripts.install-cordova: npx rimraf node_modules && npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=cordova npm run install
scripts.npmpack: npm run install-electron && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-platforms-1.3.20.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms/ && npx rimraf package
